mapper.select: SELECT t.task_no, t.title, t.content, t.startdate, t.enddate, t.state, u.user_no, c.category_no, c.name FROM task t JOIN users u ON t.user_no = u.user_no JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.category_no WHERE u.user_no=#{userNo};
SELECT t.task_no, t.title, t.content, t.startdate, t.enddate, t.state, c.category_no, c.name FROM task t JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.category_no WHERE t.task_no = #{categoryNo};
